articles.title: First U.S. reinforcement troops arrive in Poland, more expected - Reuters
articles.description: The first U.S. troops reinforcing NATO allies in Eastern Europe amid a Russian military build-up on Ukraine's border arrived on Saturday at Rzeszow military base in southeastern Poland.
